lyrics.text:
’E Lami ‘ a e ‘Otua
‘E ‘Eiki, ‘o e Melino,
‘Oku feinga hoku loto,
‘Eiki, ki ho anga’ofa.

’Oku ou kole tokoni,
‘I he’eku tu’utāmaki;
Pea u feinga ke u hoko
‘Eiki ki ho angalelei.

Pea u tokanga ma’u ai pē,
‘Eiki, ki ho finangalo,
Pea u muimui ki ai,
‘I he me’a kotoa pē.

Pea u fa’a tukuange,
‘Eku holi kehekehe,
Ka ke fakatapu, mo’ou
‘A hoku loto kotoa.

Pea ka mamahi’ia
‘A hoku sino vaivai ni
Pea u fa’a kātaki ia,
‘I he anga fakalami.

Pea ka touia hoku
Laumālie, lavea ni,
Pea u fa’a tatali lelei,
‘Eiki, ‘i he angavaivai.
